metaData.title: Rosia Montana | accommodation | hikes | bike | trails
metaData.text: Accommodation in a restored heritage house from the Historic Center. Hiking or bike trails along the roman galleries, gold mining areas, heritage buildings, mountains, lakes. Rent bikes or guided tours. At the end of the day read a book from our library in the hammock. Rosia Montana, Alba, Apuseni Mountains, Transylvania, Romania.

specificArticles.text:
Discover an unique cultural heritage built by various civilizations since antiquity to extract gold (proposed as UNESCO site)
See the existing open pits and how could impact a new one with cyanide like the one proposed by canadians.
Nature and serenity - all around us are massifs, lakes and protected natural areas great for hiking or cycling.

specificArticles.text: We want to offer an unique and authentic experience on your holiday in Rosia Montana, that's why we offer accommodation in the historic center and we put you in touch with the locals who makes guided trails, traditional food or who rent bikes.
